text: hello how are you
Hello, I am fine how are you?
im fine do you know anything for this organization
I have helped few organizations though MTurk. I know about a few children\'s charity like "save the children"
very good do you donate for this?
Yes i usually donate a part or all of my bonus or reward
oh good, i have donate 100$ , i love the children
Wow that is a good amount. I have soft heart for children too, There are many issues i like them to be solved
other happiness is the motive of my life, I'm happy to help others and especially the children
Yes even a little help can make a big difference, I would love to join and help in person but I have time shortage
what about you, but the thought that you have to help pass the positivity
Thanks, I try to donate as much as possible. I like to help charities that focus on education and health issues of children. I liked to know more though
this is life so we are humane to help one another even with moral support
Exactly, we should help as much as we can. I would like to know if there are charities to prevent children marriage.
yes this is true
some of these charities are very clear about their financial report which courages me to donate
this is the best, transparency must be their virtue
yes and I like when big companies get involved and donate too
there are mos possibility to help
yes like donating part of our purchase is a good idea
